import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from "../components/FormContainer" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { saveShippingAddress } from '../actions/cartActions' function ShippingScreen({ navigate }) { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const {shippingAddress} = cart const dispatch = useDispatch() const [address, setAddress] = useState(shippingAddress.address) const [city, setCity] = useState(shippingAddress.city) const [postalCode, setPostalCode] = useState(shippingAddress.postalCode) const [country, setCountry] = useState(shippingAddress.country) const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(saveShippingAddress({address, city, postalCode, country})) } return (

Shipping

Address setAddress(e.target.value)} style={{ fontSize: '1.5rem', padding: '1rem' }} /> City setCity(e.target.value)} style={{ fontSize: '1.5rem', padding: '1rem' }} /> Postal Code setPostalCode(e.target.value)} style={{ fontSize: '1.5rem', padding: '1rem' }} /> Country setCountry(e.target.value)} style={{ fontSize: '1.5rem', padding: '1rem' }} />
) } export default ShippingScreen
